DArray< Data > Class Template Reference
Object Arrays

Detailed Description

template<typename Data>
class Util::DArray< Data >

Dynamically allocatable Array class template.

A DArray wraps a dynamically allocated C Array. Unlike an STL std::vector, a DArray cannot be resized after it is allocated.

Definition at line 176 of file DArray.h.

Member Function Documentation

DArray< Data > & operator= ( const DArray< Data > &  other)

Assignment operator.

If this DArray is not allocated, allocates and copies all elements.

If this and the other DArray are both allocated, the capacities must be exactly equal. If so, this method copies all elements.

Parameters:
otherthe RHS DArray
